channel.title: Comments on: New Discoveries
channel.description: tales in the life of Madeline Ann Downey

item.title: By: Alma Vogt
item.dc:creator: Alma Vogt
item.description: Your beautiful little girl is really growing up fast. She is a charmer for sure.
item.content:encoded: Your beautiful little girl is really growing up fast. She is a charmer for sure.

item.title: By: katie
item.dc:creator: katie
item.description: haha yes it's their Daddy-Daughter Date (or should i say Daddyoo-Daughter?)
item.content:encoded: haha yes it’s their Daddy-Daughter Date (or should i say Daddyoo-Daughter?)

item.title: By: LeAnn
item.dc:creator: LeAnn
item.description: Maddieyoo, you are so dang cute! I really like that you and daddyoo go to Meijer on the weekends and let mommyoo sleep in. :)
item.content:encoded: Maddieyoo, you are so dang cute! I really like that you and daddyoo go to Meijer on the weekends and let mommyoo sleep in.
